title: [Client] Connection Mis-detection
body: Well, there's nothing that I can say to help you guys figure it out, other than even when I restart my computer, the client, my wifi or anything, the league client says I am not connected. I cannot log in, I cannot do anything. So for now I am back to being like {{champion:32}} and having no friends.

replies.body: Your description helps a lot, and it sounds like your network is having issues connecting to the authentication servers.  This could be due to a block from a setting or program, or a bad connection.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Me too, as I was trying to patch of course. After closing all the "ranked's here" pop-ups, the client quit out.

Edit: After waiting on that screen it unlocked... But now it has actually re-appeared lol!
Same here. Hope Riot can get whatever it is causing this figured out.
Hm. Weird. Also I low key placed this in the wrong Board >_> Gonna Copy Pasta it over to Bug Report
